trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> type generates service contract code and binding configurations from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> description objects.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator> to create tools or to modify the default contract generation process using an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> class with a new <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> instance to use to generate code.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> instance to use to generate binding configurations.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> instance and the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> instance to use to generate code.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> instance to use to generate binding configurations.
Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> instance that contains the generated binding configurations.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> instance that contains the generated endpoint configurations.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> objects generated when generating service contract code and endpoint configurations.
These error and warning messages can be used by tools to display debugging information to users.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataConversionError"></xref> objects.
Generates a binding configuration for the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> instance.
The configuration name for the binding is taken from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding.Name%2A> property.
Binding configuration names are made unique by adding integers to the binding configuration name.
The binding section name is the name of the binding configuration section that the binding configuration was added to.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> to use to generate the binding configuration.
The name of the generated binding section.
The name of the generated binding configuration.
Generates a service contract type from the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription"></xref> instance.
Other code artifacts may also get generated as specified by using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator.Options%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription"></xref> to use to generate the contract type.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> instance for the generated contract type.
Generates a service contract type and an endpoint configuration from the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> instance.
Other code artifacts may also get generated as specified by using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator.Options%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> to use to generate the contract type.
The generated endpoint configuration.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> instance for the generated contract type.
Gets a mapping from contract description namespaces to managed namespaces that is used when generating code.
Use this property to associated a contract description namespace with a managed namespace that is used when generating code.
You can use the wildcard character "*" as the dictionary key to specify a managed namespace to use for any description namespaces that are not explicitly mapped to a managed namespace.
The default managed namespace is used when no namespace mapping is specified for a particular description namespace.
A mapping from contract description namespaces to managed namespaces.
Gets or sets options for generating service contract code.
Use this property to specify various options for code generation.
This enumeration has a <xref:System.FlagsAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions"></xref> object.
Gets a mapping from contract descriptions to referenced contract types.
Code is not generated for referenced contract types.
Instead the referenced type is used.
A mapping from contract descriptions to referenced contract types.
Gets the target <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> object for generating service contract code.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> object.
